product_name: Arc'teryx Phase SL Crew Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: Along with high-performance moisture management to keep you comfortable in cool weather, the silkweight Arc'teryx Phase SL Crew long underwear top has adventure woven into the fabric. Polyester and polypropylene fabric wicks moisture and keeps you cool during high-output activity and dries quickly to regulate temperature. Lightweight fabric features a smooth face that makes it easy to wear under additional layers, and mechanical stretch woven into the fabric moves with you. Encapsulated silver ions help fight odors. Flatlock seams feel great next to skin; heat transfer label means no annoying tag. Arc'teryx Phase SL Crew long underwear top offers a next-to-skin fit.
